item.title: Hello!
item.description: My name is Diego González, I am a Cloud Engineer and this is a simple website made just for fun! I made this using: Git Git-Hub Pages Hugo Linux A purchased domain :)
item.content:
My name is Diego González, I am a Cloud Engineer and this is a simple website made just for fun! I made this using:

  • Git
  • Git-Hub Pages
  • Hugo
  • Linux
  • A purchased domain :)
